TopicTitle: For SCIENCE! A collection of my "experiments."

Articles.Content:
"The only difference between insanity and science is writing it down." -Person I didn't bother to find.

So I came up with the idea to attach 64 Clydesdale boosters +1 for the center spire to a command pod.

The center one instantly detached and blew up. But the other 64- They became this weird, beautiful formation like some creature at the bottom of the sea. It was beautiful. Sadly, it wasn't recorded and isn't replicatable. Not science, just insanity.

But, I later captured this glitch. Wait until the end. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VAVVcKTf0fU

And then, 128 Mastodons to the biggest tank in the game. Here it is: https://youtu.be/c6O2SFTFmgs

Edited May 6, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal
Science marches on. Even if the ships blow up.
